text: Bob Lambert in his undercover days in
the 1980s while posing as an animal
rights activist he began a relationship
with a campaigner who wants to be known
only as Jackie they were together for
three and a half years and had a son
when their child was two his father
vanished 25 years later Jackie learned
from a newspaper that the father of her
child had been a police spy it was just
the start of like the crumbling of
everything everything I possibly thought
of in the I thought of my foundations
don't exist anymore and I don't know if
they ever will months before Jackie
discovered the truth
Bob Lambert had been confronted over his
past by former campaigners from an
anti-capitalist group he had infiltrated
during his undercover years by now he'd
left the police and had become an
academic and author meanwhile jackie
learned for the first time that when he
began his relationship with her in his
real life bob Lambert was married with
two children
I had a spy who was being paid by the
government to spy on me to the extent
that he watched me give birth he was
with 14 hours of me giving birth I mean
how did he report that back her
ex-partner was part of an undercover
unit which infiltrated protest groups a
dozen women once involved in political
activism and now involved in legal
action against the met after they
unknowingly had sexual relationships
with police spies tonight commenting on
this first case to be settled the force
said it unreservedly apologizes for any
pain and suffering that the relationship
with Bob Lambert an undercover officer
has had on this woman it said it has
never had a policy that officers can use
sexual relations for the purposes of
policing the former officers conduct has
cost his force four hundred and twenty
five thousand pounds as well as
fathering a child he had sexual
relationships with three other women
while
to cover one of them is also bringing
legal action against Scotland Yard Jim
Kelly BBC News
